heading: HR00812
0:
RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION TO
AUTHORIZE AND ENCOURAGE ALL PUBLIC AND PRIVATE HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS TO END THE CURRENT SEMESTER OR EQUIVALENT ACADEMIC PERIOD BY APRIL 30, 2020 AND TO ADOPT A “PASS” OR “DROP” GRADING SYSTEM
principal-authors: VILLANUEVA, EDUARDO "BRO. EDDIE" C.; RIVERA, DOMINGO C.;
status: Pending with the Committee on HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION since 2020-05-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00812
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION TO AUTHORIZE AND ENCOURAGE ALL PUBLIC AND PRIVATE HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS TO END THE CURRENT SEMESTER OR EQUIVALENT ACADEMIC PERIOD BY APRIL 30, 2020 AND TO ADOPT A “PASS” OR “DROP” GRADING SYSTEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLANUEVA, EDUARDO "BRO. EDDIE" C., RIVERA, DOMINGO C.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
